<Text: Verve was a modernist Parisian art magazine published by Teriade between 1937 and 1960.>
Triplets:<Verve
1:
--------------------
Text: Verve (1937–60):  The magazine was first published in December 1937.
Triplets:<Verve
3:
--------------------
Text: Verve (1937–60):  It published 38 issues in 10 volumes including lithographs by the most prominent artists of the Parisian art scene of the first half of the 20th century.
Triplets:<Verve
5:
--------------------
Text: Verve (1937–60):  The magazine folded in 1960.
Triplets:<Verve
